home.filesWillAppearHere: Files you tag will appear here

powerbi.title: Embed Power BI report
powerbi.subtitle: Complete and save your report
powerbi.overwriteModalTitle: A report with this name already exists
powerbi.overwriteModalBody: Do you want to overwrite the report? This action cannot be reversed.

findWorkspaceAndReport.msg: The {workspaceId}, {reportId} and {reportPageName} can be found in the report URL.

superset.title: Embed Superset dashboard
superset.subtitle: Complete and save your dashboard
superset.overwriteModalTitle: A file with this name already exists
superset.overwriteModalBody: Do you want to overwrite the file? This action cannot be reversed.

embed.title: Embed external link
embed.subtitle: Complete and save your external link
embed.overwriteModalTitle: A file with this name already exists
embed.overwriteModalBody: Do you want to overwrite the file? This action cannot be reversed.

navbarProfile.title: Profile
navbarProfile.content: Here you can view and edit your profile.

navbarSearch.title: Search
navbarSearch.content: Search here for any file in the repository.

navbarSettings.title: Settings
navbarSettings.content: Access the general options of the platform.

homeTabHome.title: Home tab
homeTabHome.content: Files selected by the administrator from the search tool will appear for all users on the home tab.

homeTabFavorites.title: Favorites tab
homeTabFavorites.content: Files selected by you from the search tool will appear on the favorites tab.

homeTabNew.title: New tab
homeTabNew.content: Additional tabs will show you the files tagged with the name of that tab.

sidebarHome.title: Home
sidebarHome.content: Go back to the home page from here.

sidebarTools.title: Tools
sidebarTools.content: Here you can create a new file using one of the installed tools.

sidebarToolStpivot.title: STPivot
sidebarToolStpivot.content: STPivot is an OLAP viewer for multidimensional analysis.

sidebarToolStolap.title: STOlap
sidebarToolStolap.content: STOlap is an open source analytical viewer developed by Stratebi.

sidebarToolStreport.title: STReport
sidebarToolStreport.content: STReport is a tool for creating, modifying and displaying reports.

sidebarToolStpanels.title: STPanels
sidebarToolStpanels.content: STPanels is a tool for creating dashboards.

sidebarToolStdashboard.title: STDashboard
sidebarToolStdashboard.content: STDashboard is a tool for creating dashboards.

sidebarToolStagile.title: STAgile
sidebarToolStagile.content: STAgile is a tool for creating dashboards.

sidebarToolStcard.title: STCard
sidebarToolStcard.content: STCard is a tool for creating, managing and analyzing scorecards.

sidebarToolCde.title: CDE
sidebarToolCde.content: CDE is Pentaho's built-in tool for creating dashboards.

sidebarToolJpivot.title: JPivot
sidebarToolJpivot.content: JPivot is Pentaho's built-in OLAP viewer.

sidebarOpened.title: Opened
sidebarOpened.content: Here you can see the currently open files.

sidebarBrowser.title: Browser
sidebarBrowser.content: The file browser allows you to browse the files in the repository.

sidebarSearch.title: Search
sidebarSearch.content: The search tool allows you to find any file in the repository.

sidebarDatasources.title: Datasources
sidebarDatasources.content: Manage datasources, Mondrian schemas and report metadata.

sidebarAdministration.title: Administration
sidebarAdministration.content: The administration page allows you to access the platform options restricted to administrators.

sidebarLocales.title: Languages
sidebarLocales.content: The interface language is automatically selected, but you can choose the one you want from here.

sidebarLogout.title: Logout
sidebarLogout.content: Close from here the current session.
